mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOFRBOARD3 (moFBNum, moFBSubject, userId, moFBCreated, moFBContent) VALUES(mocofb_seq.NEXTVAL, #{moFBSubject}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{moFBContent})
mapper.select: SELECT moFBNum, userId, moFBSubject, moFBContent, moFBHit, moFBCreated FROM MOFRBOARD3 WHERE moFBNum = #{moFBNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE MOFRBOARD3 SET moFBHit = moFBHit+1 WHERE moFBNum = #{moFBNum}
